item.title: 【Cinema Center】SERIES - Mr.Bean.S01.576p.AMZN.WEB-DL.DDP2.0.H.264-Samuel
item.description:
Mr. Bean
Season 1

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Alternate Artwork 5 | Alternate Artwork 6 | Alternate Artwork 7

1992 • 14 episodes

Description
Life is a difficult challenge for Mr Bean, who despite being a grown adult, has trouble completing even the simplest of tasks. Thankfully, his perseverance is usually rewarded, and he finds an ingenious way around the problem. British sitcom created by Rowan Atkinson and Richard Curtis, and starring Atkinson as the title character.
Click to expand...
Details
Genres: Kids • Comedy
Click to expand...
More Details
Audio languages: English
Subtitles: English [CC]
Directors: John Birkin, Paul Weiland, John Howard-Davies
Producers: John Howard-Davies, Sue Vertue, Peter Bennett-Jones
Starring: Rowan Atkinson, Robin Driscoll, Matilda Ziegler
Studio: Tiger Aspect Productions
